name: Petite Bakers
description: This class teaches tots the art of baking in a fun and energetic setting. Learn the basics of baking, while learning how to safely work in a kitchen. The parent will be asked to provide some materials for the classes. Please notify program coordinator of any dietary restrictions: don.franklin@sfgov.org.

howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900 Check Calendar for availability.
